entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
